name: Funky Urban Gem: Prime Central Location - Parking!
description:
Step into the charming and comfy 1BR/1BA apartment in the heart of Albany, NY. It promises a relaxing retreat bordering picturesque Washington Park and funky Lark Street while being within walking distance to the vibrant downtown, which offers easy access to restaurants, shops, and exciting attractions.

The lovely design and the prime location will leave you in awe.

✔ Comfy Queen Bedroom
✔ Open Design Living
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Smart TV
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Free Parking

See more below!
neighborhood_overview:
Overview

The lovely apartment is located in the Hudson/Park neighborhood in the heart of Albany, which stands out as one of the city's most vibrant and walkable urban enclaves. Bordered by the lush expanse of Washington Park and the eclectic energy of Lark Street, our local offers an unbeatable blend of historic charm, city convenience, and cultural flair.

Here, you'll be able to easily visit the scenic trails and gardens of Washington Park, the lively shops, cafes, and restaurants of Lark Street, and the city's downtown core. The New York State Capitol, Albany Medical Center, Albany Law School, and SUNY Albany are all within easy walking distance, making the neighborhood a perfect home base for students, professionals, and urban explorers.

Just a block from Washington Park, Lark Street pulses with creativity and energy. Known as Albany's "Greenwich Village," it's lined with independent shops, coffeehouses, art galleries, and restaurants representing cu
host_about:
Hello! I’m a proud resident of Albany, NY, where i both live and work With a background in real estate and management, I bring years of expertise to hosting and caring for my own property here in Albany. In addition to managing vacation rentals, I also own a Japanese restaurant, so hospitality and guest satisfaction are at the heart of everything I do.

I look forward to welcoming you to Albany and sharing the best of the city with you!

description: Immaculate two level 3000 Sq. Ft. Bright & Sunny Cape Cod with 4 large bedrooms, Den, 2 full baths, living, dining & kitchen. Central Air & Heat. neighborhood_overview:
Enjoy to the fullest this immaculate Cape Cod in the middle of Nature yet close to everything! Wake up to the singing birds chirping pleasant morning music. Quite street, steps to the creek, few minutes walk to the public transport. Relax on the deck overlooking creek with nature sounds.

Enjoy & Relax in the heart of Capital Region!

Albany, New York, whether nature or history is your passion, you'll find an abundance of both in this upstate New York gem. Immerse yourself in breathtaking fall views on an autumn day in city surrounded by mountains, rich history, culture, picturesque architecture and exhilarating nearby attractions. Albany is one of the oldest surviving European settlements with endless natural beauty combined with all the perks and comforts a city has to offer.

Experience everything from fishing to skiing, hiking to biking, pristine lakes to caves, exquisite cuisine to shopping, historic churches to museums, art galleries to antique Sto
host_about: Nature loving person with a major focus on health, cleanliness and education. I am from India,  but lived in NY since 2001. I have a passion for sports and love traveling and exploring new parts of the US. I enjoy long walks, jogging, hiking, yoga and meditation. My goal for Airbnb guests is to offer the very best stay experience via "Immaculately Clean - Home Away From Home"  at a reasonable price.

name: Alb Medical/Dtwn Albany/Colleges ROOM H
description: Private bedroom, shared living room, and shared bathroom on the 2nd floor in my personal home with 2-3 guests. 3 fans in each bedroom. 16 inch memory foam mattress. Mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and toaster in the room.  No ac and no kitchen use. Self-check-in Owner-occupied house. On bus lines. You’ll love my place because of its uniqueness, location, and vintage finds.  Direct bus line to Greyhound, Amtrak, Mall, Empire State Plaza, , and Suny Albany.  Free street parking only.
neighborhood_overview:
Pine Hills. Good and safe walking distance to Albany Medical Center, VA hospital, CDPC, Saint Rose College, Sage College, Albany Medical College, UAlbany Downtown campus, and Washington Park. 3-4 blocks. Close to downtown. Law/Pharmacy/Medical schools. 5 min bus ride to Empire State Plaza or a 20 min walk. 2 blocks to rent a bike station. Free Broadway-style musicals in the park during July and August. A must-see.
Walking distance to the tennis court and lake at Washington Park. (2 blocks)
Lark Street 15 minutes walk....Try Bombers Burrito Bar.. Starbucks, Panera Bread, CVS, Chinese food and bank. 10 minutes walk. Morris Street and New Scotland Ave. Pizza. Madison Ave and Ontario Street. 3 blocks. Price Chopper supermarket. 15 minutes walk or #114 bus to Madison Ave and Main. Laundromat.. Madison and Quail. 2 blocks. Madison Theater 15 minutes walk or #114 to Madison Ave and Main. Spectrum Theater.. #100 bus at Morris St and Quail to New Scotland and Delaware..walk 2 block
host_about:
We are fully vaccinated for Covid-19 with boosters. (Mother and daughter) Please note: Bad reviews are from guests breaking my house rules, not reading the listing description about my room spaces and amenities offered. Also, from racists, haters and misogynistic guests.
We are well traveled African American women and we take pride in our culture and ancestors. It is important to be our authentic selves, without being washed.  My home has ethnic food smells, flags, sarcastic signs, Black art, social justice signs and visiable security cameras. Yes! 5 out of eight letters of my name spell SHARE :) I was a home school/unschooled parent. (Florida and Nevada) My daughter graduated from University At Albany with honors. Class of 2020... and recently graduated with a master's degree.  Class of 2021. She is currently a PhD student at Stony Brook University.  We are hosts and guests of Airbnb. I am originally from Chicago and The Bronx. I am a non smoker and non drinker. We traveled to many states on a budget, including Alaska and Hawaii. We also traveled to: Canada, Mexico, Caribbean and Europe.  We loved Victoria, BC, Montreal, QC, Dublin, Ireland, Paris, France and Brussels, Belgium the most.  I love older homes with character and history. I am a proud owner of a "Turn Of A Century"  Classic American Foursquare. unique home. (1900)  Captain Arthur William Brandt was one of the previous owners. I had bought my house. in 1999.  We are passionate about social justice issues. We lived in Miami, Orlando/Winter Park, Las Vegas, Montreal and Dominican Republic. I enjoy watching home improvement shows and documentaries. I love to shop at thrift stores for rare, cultured and vintage finds. We love the beauty and peacefulness of nature. We love musicals and ballets. If your last name is (military) Brandt, (pharmacy) Schneible or (nursing)Wagenbaugh, (previous owners) I will offer you 25% off your daily rate. (Not by marriage) Check your Ancestry, Myheritage and 23andme accounts, we maybe related. ;)  I am 9% England/Wales, 3% South Asian  1% Irish, 3% Norway,  1% Native American, 1% Iberian Peninsula and you can guess the rest...lol...(African)  Maternal Melungeon ancestry.  We share paternal DNA with Ramesses lll...Egyptian royalty and my maternal 2nd great grandfather is Little Wyatt Tate and my maternal 4th great grandfather is Judge/senator Charles Tait of Georgia and Alabama... My daughter is 27% European. Caribbean roots . (Jamaica) (DNA)  *Take the test.

name: 8 year SuperHost 5Bedroom In Albany
description:
Our spacious 2048 sq. ft. 5 bedroom. 2 bath, house is the perfect place for serious minded groups.

We welcome business travelers and family travelers looking for a quiet, sanitized gorgeous home for extended stays in the city. Our reviews emphasize that we offer the comfortable accommodations to meet all of your needed expectations.
Welcome to Albany
neighborhood_overview:
The home is located in a quiet residential neighborhood conveniently located 5 minutes from Interstate90 only ten miles from Albany International Airport and just 10 minutes from the city center, New York State Senate building, The MVP Arena and The Albany Convention Center. We are also only 5.5 miles from the Regeneron facility across the river in Rensselaer. The Perfect Location and amenities to suit your needs

Within a three mile radius you will find...

• St Peter's Hospital
• College of St. Rose
• Sage College of Albany
• Us Marine Corps Reserve Trng
• Albany College of Pharmacy
• Albany Medical College
• Albany Medical Center South
• Bleecker Stadium
• VA Medical Center
• Washington Park
• Albany Center Galleries
• New York State Museum
• Albany Institute History and Art
• Alfred E. Smith State Office Building
• Cultural Education Center
• Corning Tower
• Irish American Heritage M
host_about:
Michael and I are foodies. We love cooking and sharing what we cook with our family and friends. 
We love dancing and music, but most importantly we love a peaceful home.
In my travels, especially business travel, I appreciated most my accommodations where it was clean, where I can feel as though I am home and the host took careful care to my need for peace and privacy. 
In our properties we love to give people the space to feel their privacy is considered, and enough interaction to make them feel as though they are home. We are Inn owners, therefore hosting is something we enjoy. 
Between Michael and I we have 5 sons. From ages 18 thru 33. All with the spirit of service.

name: Garden Apartment, on the Park, close to Capital.
description: Our recently remodeled one-bedroom apartment boasts a park view, easy parking and is close to downtown Albany. We have an easy walk to groceries, Government Buildings, Albany Law School, College of Pharmacy, VA and Albany Medical Center Hospitals, and Lark Street restaurants and nightlife. description:

neighborhood_overview:
The lovely apartment is located in the Hudson/Park neighborhood in the heart of Albany, which stands out as one of the city's most vibrant and walkable urban enclaves. Bordered by the lush expanse of Washington Park and the eclectic energy of Lark Street, our local offers an unbeatable blend of historic charm, city convenience, and cultural flair.

Here, you'll be able to easily visit the scenic trails and gardens of Washington Park, the lively shops, cafes, and restaurants of Lark Street, and the city's downtown core. The New York State Capitol, Albany Medical Center, Albany Law School, and SUNY Albany are all within easy walking distance, making the neighborhood a perfect home base for students, professionals, and urban explorers.

Just a block from Washington Park, Lark Street pulses with creativity and energy. Known as Albany's "Greenwich Village," it's lined with independent shops, coffeehouses, art galleries, and restaurants representing cuisines from around t
host_about:
Hello! I’m a proud resident of Albany, NY, where i both live and work With a background in real estate and management, I bring years of expertise to hosting and caring for my own property here in Albany. In addition to managing vacation rentals, I also own a Japanese restaurant, so hospitality and guest satisfaction are at the heart of everything I do.

I look forward to welcoming you to Albany and sharing the best of the city with you!

neighborhood_overview: This building is located a short walk from all of Downtown Albany. Nearby you'll find famous Lark Street, Broadway Street, the Times Union Center, and tons oh historic buildings. neighborhood_overview: Tree lined streets, sidewalks, tight knit community, and local services such as a hospital, specialty and retail shops and the Capital Hills Golf Course are a few of many attractions to the neighborhood.  Normanskill Deriving its name from Norman’s Creek, Normanskill is a residential community tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the City. Large lawns, trees and location right off of New Scotland Avenue area few of many amenities of the neighborhood. North Albany / Shaker Park A tight knit community with an Irish past, the neighborhood enjoys a golf course, Sacred Heart Park, Hackett Park, and will soon host a brand new YMCA facility. Housing styles are typically a mixture of single family and duplexes. Park South Tucked between the growing University Heights and Washington Park, Park South features a mix of housing styles. Located close to services on New Scotland Avenue and downtown, getting anywhere quickly is easy

neighborhood_overview:
This airbnb is on a quiet street in downtown Albany.

The Bull & Bee is located right downstairs which is a wonderful Meadery & Tasting Room to try.

Lark Street is filled with incredible bars and restaurants and it's only 5 minutes away! Some of our favorite restaurants include, Dove + Deer, The Loft, Rain Modern Chinese and Rosanna's.

If you want to walk to dinner, Cafe Capriccio is only 1 minute away and has some of the most delicious Italian food!

The Egg and Empire State Plaza are less than a 3 minute drive away.

For groceries Market 32 is only 4 minutes away. You will have everything you need!

You will be in very close vicinity to a lot of great attractions!

description:
Step into the charming and comfy 1BR/1BA apartment in the heart of Albany, NY. It promises a relaxing retreat bordering picturesque Washington Park and funky Lark Street while being within walking distance to the vibrant downtown, which offers easy access to restaurants, shops, and exciting attractions.

The lovely design and the prime location will leave you in awe.

✔ Comfy Queen Bedroom
✔ Open Design Living
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Smart TV
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Free Parking

See more below!
neighborhood_overview:
Overview

The lovely apartment is located in the Hudson/Park neighborhood in the heart of Albany, which stands out as one of the city's most vibrant and walkable urban enclaves. Bordered by the lush expanse of Washington Park and the eclectic energy of Lark Street, our local offers an unbeatable blend of historic charm, city convenience, and cultural flair.

Here, you'll be able to easily visit the scenic trails and gardens of Washington Park, the lively shops, cafes, and restaurants of Lark Street, and the city's downtown core. The New York State Capitol, Albany Medical Center, Albany Law School, and SUNY Albany are all within easy walking distance, making the neighborhood a perfect home base for students, professionals, and urban explorers.

Just a block from Washington Park, Lark Street pulses with creativity and energy. Known as Albany's "Greenwich Village," it's lined with independent shops, coffeehouses, art galleries, and restaurants representing cu
host_about:
Hello! I’m a proud resident of Albany, NY, where i both live and work With a background in real estate and management, I bring years of expertise to hosting and caring for my own property here in Albany. In addition to managing vacation rentals, I also own a Japanese restaurant, so hospitality and guest satisfaction are at the heart of everything I do.

I look forward to welcoming you to Albany and sharing the best of the city with you!

name: *The Rustic Home* 3 Bedroom Second Floor Apartment
description: Welcome to this rustic second-floor apartment in Albany, New York! This newly remodeled three-bedroom, one-bath gem is perfect for a comfortable stay for up to six guests. Step into a piece of history with original hardwood floors dating back to 1890. The spacious dining area is ideal for gathering, and the apartment features a 65-inch smart TV for your entertainment needs. Need to catch up on work? We've got you covered with a dedicated work desk. Book now for an unforgettable experience!
neighborhood_overview:
This property is located within a three minute walk of Washington Park and a two minute walk from local restaurant hotspot The Cuckoo's Nest. It is also a short distance from Dunkin' Donuts, a chain of restaurants located on Madison Avenue and more.

This apartment is also located just a few miles from Lark Street and downtown Albany where you will find all types of different cuisines and entertainment.

name: Downtown Albany 2 Bedroom + Workstation @ The Mark
description:
Charming 2 Bedroom + Workstation apartment in Downtown Albany. Centrally located and easy walking! NFL Blitz Arcade Game. Pets allowed! 2nd FL apartment with an elevator on site!

Enjoy hardwood floors, a custom kitchen, soaking bathtub, and central AC. Featuring a King Bed, Queen bed, pull-out couch, workstation with monitor, and free WiFi. Includes access to a shared washer/dryer.

For long term stays over 1 month, a monthly parking space will be included. Parking garage close by.
neighborhood_overview:
Downtown Albany - Corner of North Pearl and Maiden Lane. Hopping area!

Located in the heart of Downtown Albany, Maiden Lane is one of Albany's oldest streets - dating back to the mid 1600s when it was called Rom Street. The building is located on a cobblestone lined block at the corner of North Pearl & Maiden Lane. The Corning River Preserve is located 2 blocks away.

There are many fantastic local dining options around Albany! Within a few minutes, here are some of my favorites:

Food / Restaurants / Bars

Cobblestone Lunch Shoppe @ 37 Maiden Lane, Albany
Emmanuel Thai Restaurant @ 35 Maiden Lane, Albany
Pearl Street Diner @ 40 North Pearl, Albany
Downtown Nutrition Albany @ 27 North Pearl, Albany
Wizard Burger @ 74 North Pearl, Albany
The Skinny Pancake Albany @ 1 Steuben Street, Albany
Café Capriccio @ 49 Grand St., Albany
Banh Mi 47 @ 74 N. Pearl Street, Albany
Ria’s Bistro @ 113 State Street., Alba

description: Immerse yourself in this meticulously updated 2-bedroom unit, where modern amenities and chic designer furnishings ensure a delightful stay. This elegant abode is mere steps from renowned restaurants, iconic landmarks, and vibrant nightlife. neighborhood_overview:
Center Square, Albany, NY, is a vibrant and historic neighborhood known for its charming brownstones, tree-lined streets, and eclectic culture. Nestled in the heart of the city, it boasts a diverse community, bustling with artists, professionals, and families alike.

The neighborhood is teeming with an array of restaurants, cafes, and shops, offering everything from artisanal cuisine to vintage finds. Lark Street, the main thoroughfare, is a hub of activity, with its lively bars, galleries, and boutiques.

Center Square is also home to several iconic landmarks, including the New York State Capitol and Washington Park. The park provides a peaceful oasis amidst the urban bustle, with its scenic walking paths, lush greenery, and picturesque lake.

With its historic architecture, vibrant culture, and prime location, Center Square embodies the essence of Albany living. It's a place where past and present converge, creating a dynamic and exciting atmosphere that
host_about: I am a dedicated mother with a passion for health, wellness, gardening, cooking, travel, design, and aesthetics. As a detail-oriented native of the Capital District, I am committed to providing my guests with a delightful and memorable stay in Albany.

name: 🍃Chic & Cozy Near Washington Park Garden Suite
description:
Charming private 1 bed, 1 bath garden suite just steps away from historic Washington Park.

Walking distance from Albany Med. and downtown SUNY. A stylish brownstone with culturally diverse art & experiences & full amenities.

Near iconic places like the NYS Capital, Empire State Plaza, Egg Performing Arts Ctr., restaurants, and more.

The unit is perfect for mature business & medical travelers, and couples looking for a home away from home to unwind and relax while visiting the Capital.
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in a beautifully renovated historic Brownstone that was built in 1890. We are situated on the cusp of the Washington Park & Pine Hills neighborhoods. Our guests get the pleasure of enjoying the best of both worlds, including the diverse cultural landscape that comes with each of these communities. It is our pleasure to introduce you to that experience!

UAlbany’s downtown campus is across the street and Albany Medical Center is within walking distance either through the park or along beautiful tree lined city blocks. Washington Park is across the street and features several events through out the year including a drummers’ circle, plays at the boathouse, the city's winter lights display, a farmers' market, the Tulip Festival, and much, much more. Feel free to grab one of our complimentary blankets to enjoy a picnic down by the lake or to catch a little sun during the summer.

Our neighborhood has a walk score of 90 making it a “Walker’s Par
host_about:
Our team works hard to ensure guests feel welcome while honoring their privacy at a fair rate.  Thank you for looking us up~we hope to see you soon! 

Please note, that there is some minor construction happening nearby as reflected in the nightly rate.

name: Private Garden Apt in Downtown Albany|Pets Allowed
description: Discover Lark Street - A Hip Albany Neighborhood. With countless restaurants, cafes, art galleries, special events, and more, this funky arts and entertainment district is a major Albany hotspot. The Spot on Lark is a beautifully renovated 1850s era 4 - story brick building, in the heart of Lark Street, and a perfect oasis to relax and explore. We have taken ample time to carefully craft this space with tasteful décor, to maximize its potential and ensure your enjoyment
neighborhood_overview:
If you visit Albany’s Capital Region without seeing Lark Street, then you have indeed missed its unique and funky urban center. Lark Street is often referred to as the “Greenwich Village” of Albany’s Capital Region. The area along Lark Street is reminiscent of the great and colorful neighborhoods of Manhattan, and is just steps from downtown Albany’s business district. Brownstones from the nineteenth century line the streets, many of which are occupied by commercial tenants who have been there for decades, giving the street a decidedly vintage feel. This once-rustic neighborhood features cobblestone intersections that add to is Greenwich ambiance.

Residents lunch at cafes during the day, enjoy cocktails and shop in the numerous boutiques. Lark Street is well known for the diverse selection of foods on offer, from Tex-Mex to Greek to Thai, Indian, Hunan, and more.

name: Iconic City Center Apt in Downtown | Pets Allowed
description: Discover Lark Street - A Hip Albany Neighborhood. With countless restaurants, cafes, art galleries, special events, and more, this funky arts and entertainment district is a major Albany hotspot. The Iconic Downtown Apartment is a beautifully renovated 1850s era 4 - story brick building, in the heart of Lark Street, and a perfect oasis to relax and explore. We have taken ample time to carefully craft this space with tasteful décor, to maximize its potential and ensure your enjoyment
neighborhood_overview:
If you visit Albany’s Capital Region without seeing Lark Street, then you have indeed missed its unique and funky urban center. Lark Street is often referred to as the “Greenwich Village” of Albany’s Capital Region. The area along Lark Street is reminiscent of the great and colorful neighborhoods of Manhattan, and is just steps from downtown Albany’s business district. Brownstones from the nineteenth century line the streets, many of which are occupied by commercial tenants who have been there for decades, giving the street a decidedly vintage feel. This once-rustic neighborhood features cobblestone intersections that add to is Greenwich ambiance.

Residents lunch at cafes during the day, enjoy cocktails and shop in the numerous boutiques. Lark Street is well known for the diverse selection of foods on offer, from Tex-Mex to Greek to Thai, Indian, Hunan, and more.

description: A lovely 3 bedroom is apt in Center Square that is perfect for families and traveling professionals. neighborhood_overview: Contains many buildings of architectural significance and is locally famous for its nightlife, entertainment, culture, and dining. It is also notable for its close proximity to Washington Park. The neighborhood is often compared to New York City's Greenwich Village for its eclectic mix of residential and commercial uses, including bars, nightclubs, restaurants, and unique stores.
host_about:
I love to travel with family and friends to see new places and explore new cultures and experiences.  Sometimes I head off on my own but , these days I mainly travel with my son.

description:
Come relax at a Hidden Gem in the heart of Albany, NY. neighborhood_overview:
A Gorgeous and Cozy 4 bedroom home and 2 bathroom with a beautiful back deck approximately 1600 sqft.
The house was fully gut renovated in 2022, with everything redone tastefully from top to bottom. It was updated with everything you need to relax and enjoy your stay.

Located in the Pine Hill neighborhood of Albany, with many great restaurants and parks just minutes away.
The house is perfect for anyone traveling to Albany who wants to feel at home. With a first-floor master bedroom.
A dinning table that can fit 4, comfortable sofas in the living room. You can also find 4 fold up chairs in the first floor closet if needed.

My Sister Kate is the co-host and helps me manage the bookings.
Feel free to contact us with any questions.

neighborhood_overview:
Center Square, Albany, NY, is a vibrant and historic neighborhood known for its charming brownstones, tree-lined streets, and eclectic culture. Nestled in the heart of the city, it boasts a diverse community, bustling with artists, professionals, and families alike.

The neighborhood is teeming with an array of restaurants, cafes, and shops, offering everything from artisanal cuisine to vintage finds. Lark Street, the main thoroughfare, is a hub of activity, with its lively bars, galleries, and boutiques.

Center Square is also home to several iconic landmarks, including the New York State Capitol and Washington Park. The park provides a peaceful oasis amidst the urban bustle, with its scenic walking paths, lush greenery, and picturesque lake.

With its historic architecture, vibrant culture, and prime location, Center Square embodies the essence of Albany living. It's a place where past and present converge, creating a dynamic and exciting atmosphere that

name: Alb Medical/colleges/Dtwn Albany Room O
description:
! Private bedroom shared livingroom and shared bath on the 2nd fl

neighborhood_overview:
Lower Pine Hills neighborhood.
Safe walking neighborhood and home.
Free street parking only.
Walking distance to Albany Medical Center, Albany Law School, Albany Pharmacy School, VA Hospital, College of Saint Rose, Washington Park, Sage College, Suny Downtown Campus, Lark Street and Downtown.

host_about:
We are fully vaccinated for Covid-19 with boosters. (Mother and daughter) Please note: Bad reviews are from guests breaking my house rules, not reading the listing description about my room spaces and amenities offered. Also, from racists, haters and misogynistic guests.
We are well traveled African American women and we take pride in our culture and ancestors. It is important to be our authentic selves, without being washed.  My home has ethnic food smells, flags, sarcastic signs, Black art, social justice signs and visiable security cameras. Yes! 5 out of eight letters of my name spell SHARE :) I was a home school/unschooled parent. (Florida and Nevada) My daughter graduated from University At Albany with honors. Class of 2020... and recently graduated with a master's degree.  Class of 2021. She is currently a PhD student at Stony Brook University.  We are hosts and guests of Airbnb. I am originally from Chicago and The Bronx. I am a non smoker and non drinker. We traveled to many states on a budget, including Alaska and Hawaii. We also traveled to: Canada, Mexico, Caribbean and Europe.  We loved Victoria, BC, Montreal, QC, Dublin, Ireland, Paris, France and Brussels, Belgium the most.  I love older homes with character and history. I am a proud owner of a "Turn Of A Century"  Classic American Foursquare. unique home. (1900)  Captain Arthur William Brandt was one of the previous owners. I had bought my house. in 1999.  We are passionate about social justice issues. We lived in Miami, Orlando/Winter Park, Las Vegas, Montreal and Dominican Republic. I enjoy watching home improvement shows and documentaries. I love to shop at thrift stores for rare, cultured and vintage finds. We love the beauty and peacefulness of nature. We love musicals and ballets. If your last name is (military) Brandt, (pharmacy) Schneible or (nursing)Wagenbaugh, (previous owners) I will offer you 25% off your daily rate. (Not by marriage) Check your Ancestry, Myheritage and 23andme accounts, we maybe related. ;)  I am 9% England/Wales, 3% South Asian  1% Irish, 3% Norway,  1% Native American, 1% Iberian Peninsula and you can guess the rest...lol...(African)  Maternal Melungeon ancestry.  We share paternal DNA with Ramesses lll...Egyptian royalty and my maternal 2nd great grandfather is Little Wyatt Tate and my maternal 4th great grandfather is Judge/senator Charles Tait of Georgia and Alabama... My daughter is 27% European. Caribbean roots . (Jamaica) (DNA)  *Take the test.

neighborhood_overview: Our property is located in a vibrant, diverse urban community. While the neighborhood is safe and welcoming, guests may encounter a range of people from different backgrounds. If you have any questions or need guidance during your stay, we’re here to help ensure you have a comfortable and enjoyable visit. Please note that our cancellation policy is strict, and no refunds will be provided due to the nature of the surrounding community. For added privacy, security, and convenience, the property is equipped with keyless keypad entry on all exterior doors as well as individual bedroom doors. In addition, exterior security cameras are installed to help ensure a safe and comfortable stay for all our guests. We strive to offer a great experience and are happy to assist with any concerns during your stay.

name: Center Square Serenity: 2-Bedroom Elegance
description: Thoughtfully updated with modern amenities and chic designer furnishings this 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment with an office will make you look forward to coming home! This elegant unit is a set in a historic building on one of the most beautiful streets in Albany’s fabulous Center Square neighborhood. Footsteps  away from great restaurants, cafes, and upscale nightlife.  Check out “Dove and Deer” less than a block away the many other upscale offerings the neighborhood provides.
neighborhood_overview:
Nestled in the heart of Albany, New York, lies the picturesque and historic Center Square neighborhood, a charming enclave renowned for its timeless elegance and vibrant atmosphere.

Strolling along tree-lined streets adorned with elegant brownstones and historic architecture, one is transported to a bygone era of grace and sophistication. Each building tells a story, echoing the rich heritage of the neighborhood and its residents.

Center Square exudes a palpable sense of community, where neighbors greet each other warmly and local businesses thrive amidst a backdrop of urban charm. Quaint cafes, eclectic boutiques, and inviting eateries line the streets, offering a diverse array of culinary delights and cultural experiences.

Parks and green spaces provide a tranquil oasis amidst the bustling cityscape, inviting residents and visitors alike to pause and enjoy moments of serenity. Whether lounging in Washington Park or exploring the vibrant Lark Street co
host_about: I am a dedicated mother with a passion for health, wellness, gardening, cooking, travel, design, and aesthetics. As a detail-oriented native of the Capital District, I am committed to providing my guests with a delightful and memorable stay in Albany.

We look forward to hosting you and helping you discover all that our community has to offer!

name: Stunning Guest Suite in Historic 1874 Row House
description: Stay in Albany's Grand House! Relax in this gorgeous, light-filled 600-sf guest suite in the historic Mansion District with dramatic 14-ft ceilings, marble fireplaces, modern art, fresh flowers & plants. Suite includes bedroom, living room w/sleeper sofa, work station & private bath. Perfect for couples or a family! Walk to downtown, MVP Arena, Lark Street, bars & restaurants. 24/7 entry. EV charger (non Tesla). Lovely garden. Coffee, snacks & reliable WiFi. Super clean, comfortable & private.
neighborhood_overview:
The Mansion District is an area of Albany full of historic homes, city parks, and local businesses. Please note that we are part of the urban downtown core. It feels like a city with a lot of different types of people!

We are minutes from the downtown business district, the College of St. Rose, SUNY Albany, Albany Medical Center, Albany School of Law, Regeneron & other businesses. We are less than a mile from the Amtrak Albany station and Greyhound bus station, and a 16-min drive from the Albany airport.

You can easily walk to the Lark Street shopping district, Center Square, Washington Park, the MVP Arena, the Egg, Empire Plaza, the NY State Capitol house and the Governor's Mansion.
host_about: I run a content agency called StoryCraft with my partner, Karley. We help startups and nonprofits tell their best stories to attract their ideal audience. We also host a beautiful Airbnb in a historic Albany, NY row house. We would love to host you!

I love sailing, flying gliders, hiking, hammocks, cycling, photography, travel, minimalism, tennis,  podcasts, biohacking and my KJV.  I started traveling airbnb during my time in Europe and now I’m a host in NY!

name: *The Red House* 4 Bedrooms•Beautifully Renovated
description: "The Red House," an inspiring 4-bedroom, 2nd-floor apartment nestled in the heart of Albany. This charming space features beautifully refinished 130-year-old hardwood floors, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. A custom stone fireplace, complete with a 50-inch Samsung Smart TV, serves as the focal point of the living area. The kitchen is fully equipped for whipping up a meal. The dishwasher and laundry are conveniently located in the unit. Front and back balconies! Free street parking.
neighborhood_overview: We are located in the heart of Albany. Couple blocks from Washington Park, Albany Med, Local restaurants and bars. There is potential for noise since we are in a city.
host_about: Hi my name is Scott Guadagnino. I’ve been in the Albany area for 9 years. Went to school in South Carolina. We love hosting and having guests at our 4 Airbnb’s!

name: Luxury apartment near Saint Peter / Albany Med
description: This luxurious apartment is located on a quiet street in the heart of Albany. Ideal for professionals. It is a 10mn walk from CDTA Bus station, Saint Peter and Albany Med Hospital. Traveling nurses & Dr. are welcome for long term stays. It features a bedroom with a queen-size bed, a living room, a kitchen, a bathroom, TVs, Wi-Fi, Mini-Billiard table,  a washer/dryer, A/C & heat, a Gas fireplace, off-street parking space. The patio with a table and parasol offers a breathtaking view of landscape.
neighborhood_overview:
Neighborhood of peace and tranquility. One of the best quiet neighborhoods when considering visiting Albany. It is one of the peaceful and quiet street that you cannot find near the city. This street has less traffic, fewer passers-by, no day commercial or nocturnal activity that could affect your stay, no train or plane noise. Just a natural bird songs around the tree branches.

There are also plenty to do within walking distance including, restaurants, garden park or relax at home and watch free Netflix on the Smart TV.”
host_about: I enjoy meeting new people and familiarizing myself with other cultures. this is, essentially why I've decided to become a part-time host. I'm enthusiastic about soccer and like various farms activities.

This delightful space has a fresh and modern design, offering the perfect blend of comfort and convenience, making it an ideal home away from home for both business and leisure travelers. This pet friendly space includes an outdoor sitting area and small patio.

name: Cozy space all on 1 floor close to U Albany
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect to stop for a night or stay longer. Open living/kitchen area is perfect to hang out with family and friends. One bedroom with plenty of closet space. Bonus tv in bedroom with updated bathroom. Centrally located close to U-Albany, St. Rose, St. Peter’s & Albany Med to name a few. Quiet residential neighborhood walkable to great restaurants on Madison Avenue. Come and relax at your home away from home.
neighborhood_overview:
Pine Hills Neighborhood in Albany NY is full of both residents and businesses, located near the College of Saint Rose and UAlbany. The proximity to these universities makes Pine Hill a popular residence for students, keeping a well-maintained balance between the permanent tried-and-true residents of the area and the new, fresh young collegian faces and tastes.

With 200+ local businesses, schools, and other public services nearby, Pine Hills is not far from anything that you might ever need. And with Albany's efficient CDTA Metro and Bus system, you can go to any of these local stores (and farther) in a matter of minutes!

name: Historic, Spacious Mansion Suite
description: Welcome to the Mansion Suite, a newly renovated historic gem in the heart of Center Square.  Through a private entrance, down a long foyer, you'll discover the grand Oak Room, an expansive living/dining room with dramatic fireplace mantel, paneling, beamed ceiling, stained glass windows. Adjacent to the lounge, is a stylish and fully equipped  kitchen with new stainless steel appliances.  Both bedrooms have new queen beds, beautiful natural woodwork and overlook a private and quiet courtyard.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a quiet corner of Center Square, just a few blocks from the New York Capitol, Empire State Plaza, MVP Arena, Albany Capital Center, Washington Park, Albany Institute of History and Art, New York State Museum, The Egg Performing Arts Center, Lark Street and numerous bars/restaurants. Check out my custom guidebook (link on my profile page) for detailed restaurant, sightseeing and shopping recommendations.
host_about: I'm an artist who paints pictures of historic buildings and landscapes.  I enjoy visiting historic places, touring museums, skiing, hiking and traveling in Europe, especially Italy. Wonderful Airbnb stays in Rome, Florence, Paris, Marseille, Lisbon and Faro inspired me to become a host. I live in Albany, New York and Truro, Massachusetts.

The first level of the home is exclusively yours with an inviting living area, sun-filled dining, a fully equipped kitchen, two refreshed bathrooms and three spacious bedrooms.
Stay just 10 minutes from Downtown, Washington Park, MVP arena and of course “The Egg”!
neighborhood_overview: Nestled in the serene Buckingham Lake neighborhood, our Airbnb offers a safe and peaceful retreat in Albany, NY. Explore the nearby Buckingham Lake Park, with its scenic trails and green spaces. Enjoy the convenience of being minutes away from downtown Albany's vibrant culture, dining, and attractions. Whether you're seeking relaxation or adventure, this location provides the best of both worlds.
host_about:
Hello! I'm a New Yorker with a deep love for travel and a knack for finding amazing Airbnb stays worldwide. Now, as your host, my focus is on providing you with the ultimate comfort and convenience.

Step into my remodeled Mid-Century house,  where each room is designed for you—inviting, spacious, and serene. Anticipate a comfortable stay, rich with amenities tailored just for you.

name: Massive 4BD/3BA 2-Fl Townhouse Apt Downtown Albany
description: Stay in our 4-bedroom townhouse-style 2nd+3rd floor apartment nestled in a renovated, historic 200-year-old building located in Albany's serene Pastures neighborhood. Just a short walk from landmarks like the Albany Medical Center, Times Union Center, Empire State Plaza, and vibrant Lark Street. Easy access to I-787, I-90 & I-87. Four queen beds and a queen air mattress accommodate up to 10. Ideal for large families and groups. Dive into Albany's history with modern comforts.

+ 92 Walkscore

description:
Bright and airy newly renovated 2 Bedroom / 2 Bathroom apartment near downtown Albany. Located on the ground floor of one of Albany’s oldest townhomes, the apartment is a blend of rich historical architecture with new, modern furnishings.

neighborhood_overview:
This is a very quiet residential neighborhood. There is a large park called Lincoln Park right across the street - very pet friendly!

Market 32 the local grocery store is only a 4 minute walk.

This location is within walking distance from many of downtown Albany's hot spots

New York State Museum - 8 minute walk
Empire State Plaza - 12 minute walk
New York State Capitol - 14 minute walk
Washington Park (home to the Tulip Festival) - 19 minute walk / 6 minute drive

name: King Bed, Workspace & Laundry | Center Square Apt
description: Welcome to The Urban Nest! Our updated 1BR garden apartment in Albany’s Center Square is centrally located near restaurants, shops, and nightlife. A short walk to Washington Park, Empire State Plaza, NYS Capitol, MVP Arena, The Palace Theater, and The Egg. Enjoy a comfortable king bed, in-unit laundry, a fully equipped kitchen, a dedicated workspace, Smart TV, fast WiFi, and free on-street parking. We're here to ensure your stay is perfect!
neighborhood_overview:
Center Square is Albany’s most vibrant and historic neighborhood, celebrated for its 19th-century brownstones, tree-lined streets, and lively culture. Steeped in history, this architecturally stunning district offers a glimpse into Albany’s past while embracing a modern, urban energy.

A walk through Center Square reveals beautifully preserved row houses and charming streetscapes that make it one of the city’s most iconic areas. Lark Street, the neighborhood’s lively hub, adds contemporary flair with cozy cafes, local restaurants, and trendy bars like Savoy Taproom.

Perfectly situated near Albany’s top attractions—Washington Park, the New York State Museum, Empire State Plaza, and The Egg—Center Square is ideal for exploring the city’s rich culture and history. With its unique blend of old-world charm, modern vibrancy, and walkable convenience, this neighborhood is a must-visit for history lovers and urban adventurers alike.

name: Lofts at Washington 109 Spacious 1 Bedroom 1 Bath
description: This newly renovated 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment offers luxury living in downtown Albany. It boasts stunning city views, high-end finishes, and access to a fitness room and lounge. Conveniently close to state offices, Albany Med, UAlbany, and more! Ideal for those seeking comfort and convenience in the heart of the city.
neighborhood_overview:
Living in Central Avenue, you’re surrounded by tons of diverse cuisines from across the globe and a bustling nightlife scene, all within walking distance of each other. Historic Washington Park is just steps away, so you can stroll through its lush gardens and monuments any time you wish.

The University at Albany Downtown Campus resides here, and it’s just a quick 10-minute drive from the main campus. Residents enjoy the urban atmosphere of Central Avenue; its namesake street has numerous antique shops, thrift stores, and take-out establishments for your enjoyment. The neighborhood is two miles out from downtown Albany as well as the Hudson River.

host_about:

description: This elegant apartment on the ground floor of an historic 3-story brick row house in the heart of downtown Albany NY, opens to a beautifully appointed living/dining area, has a full kitchen, 2 spacious bedrooms, and a full bath. host_about:

Since then, we have taken over a thousand travelers to Italy, especially to Fattoria Lavacchio, our vineyard home in the Chianti region of Tuscany.  Our Airbnbs are reminiscent of  the look and feel of our Tuscan experiences.
After a long career as a musician, music educator, and arts administrator, I am delighted to host your visit to Albany!

description: Bright, peaceful 2BR unit set just outside Albany’s vibrant Center Square within walking distance to Washington Park, local cafés, restaurants, and downtown attractions. Whether you’re a solo traveler, couple, or family, you’ll find everything you need for a relaxing stay. Sip your morning coffee on the private deck with birdsong in the background, rest in a cozy queen or full bed, and enjoy self check-in, fast Wi-Fi, climate control with A/C and heat, and private garage parking right next door.
host_about:
I’m Andrés — CEO, traveler, and music lover.

I enjoy exploring new places, meeting people, and creating spaces that feel warm and intentional. More than anything, I believe how you make people feel truly matters.

I don’t believe in “just a place to sleep.” I believe in good mornings, calm evenings, and the kind of stay that leaves you lighter than you came.

Mi casa es tu casa!

description: Welcome to your home away from home in the heart of Albany! host_about:
Hello Everyone. 
My name is Nori; I am a landlord from Albany, NY. I decided to start hosting on Airbnb in 2022. I was always passionate about the hospitality industry. I did my undergraduate degree in hospitality management and truly feel passionate about providing an excellent experience to guests. 
My Sister Kate is the co-host and helps me manage the bookings.
Feel free to contact us with any questions.
